['1. Store all the clothes on the bed in the closet or drawers.', '2. Find the pillow.', '3. Put the
 pillow on the bed.']

def has_clothes_placed(char: character, surface: item):
    # Function to check if there are unvisited clothes on a specific surface
    symbol has_clothes = exists o: item : is_clothes(o) and on(o, surface) and not visited(o)
    return has_clothes

behavior store_in_closetdrawers(clothes: item, closetdrawer: item):
    # Behavior to store clothes in closetdrawers
    body:
        achieve inside(clothes, closetdrawer)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind closetdrawer: item where:
            is_closetdrawer(closetdrawer)
        # If we have already found the clothes on the bed, we can directly approach it
        if exists bed: item : is_bed(bed) and has_clothes_placed(char, bed):
            bind bed: item where:
                is_bed(bed) and has_clothes_placed(char, bed)
            # Check and move each unvisited clothes found on the bed
            foreach c: item:
                if is_clothes(c) and on(c, bed) and not visited(c):
                    observe(c, "Check clothes on the bed")
                    store_in_closetdrawers(c, closetdrawer)
        else:
            foreach bed: item:
                if is_bed(bed) and not visited(bed):
                    observe(bed, "Check if there are any clothes on the bed")
